mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.org_id AS "orgId", a.apply_id AS "applyId", a.content AS "content", a.create_id AS "createId", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.org_status AS "orgStatus", b.name AS "user.name"

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO org_audit( org_id, apply_id, content, create_id, create_date, org_status ) VALUES ( #{orgId}, #{applyId}, #{content}, #{createId}, #{createDate}, #{orgStatus} )
mapper.update: UPDATE org_audit SET org_id = #{orgId}, apply_id = #{applyId}, content = #{content}, create_id = #{createId}, create_date = #{createDate}, org_status = #{orgStatus} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT FROM org_audit a WHERE a.org_id = #{orgId}
